value.string: Task description: This task creates the daily folder structures used by the process.  This includes input, output, and log folders. Once the folders have been created, the audit and error logs are created.
Task Dependecies: 1.0.0 Posting Instructions to Eagle Master Task
Set up of input/output folder/ log files that will be used throughout the process
The if statements below creates the files and folders utilized during the bot process. The folders and files are only created if they do not exist.
Posting Instructions to Eagle - Error: Bot unable to access Shared Drive

Username: $m-string-1$
